text:
I am running a thread group with CSV Data Config (populates UDV: UserName, UserDomain, UserPassword) HTTP Cookie Manager (clear cookies enabled), HTTP Cache Manager (clear cache), HTTP Authorization Manager (properly configured using variables pre-loaded from CSV Data Config Element).

Everything runs perfectly for 1 thread, 2 threads, and 3 threads.  I set the loop to 2 and 3 as well, no issues.  However, when i increase the threads to 5, 10, or more, i begin to get errors: 
  HTTPMethodDirector: Failure Authenticating with NTLM with <anyrealm>@server:80

I can see the CSV Data config open in the log at the start, it uses several credentials from the file, and then starts to fail, and the failures occur with greater frequency the longer the tests run.

Any help would be appreciated.

Best,
creator: web@finoconsulting.com

text:
Bugzilla is not a support forum.

Please raise the question on the JMeter user list; if it turns out that there is a bug then this issue can be re-opened.
creator: sebb@apache.org
